{"id": "116829", "title": "Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.", "description": "Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not immediately change to reflect the new font size.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set the font size of a label in the UI.
2. Observe that the label's height remains unchanged.
3. ", "OB": "The label's height does not change right after modifying its font size in the UI.", "EB": "After changing the font size of the label, the label's height should be adjusted accordingly.", "SR": "The label's height should update automatically when the font size is modified."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.

In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
